title: Album Page, "Cloudy Sky and Ocean", late 19th century
medium: Graphite on white laid paper, lined
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: Quick sketch of sunlight breaking through clouds on ocean.

tombstone.epitaph:
Album Page, "Cloudy Sky and Ocean", late 19th century.
late 19th century. Graphite on white laid paper, lined. Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-85-24.
